rules.name: CLEAR
aspect: semaphore head-id:1 angle:0; light head-id:1 color:green

rules.name: APPROACH-LIMITED
rules.indication: PROCEED; APPROACH NEXT SIGNAL NOT EXCEEDING LIMITED SPEED, AND BE PREPARED TO ENTER DIVERGING ROUTE AT PRESCRIBED SPEED

rules.name: APPROACH-MEDIUM
rules.indication: PROCEED; APPROACH NEXT SIGNAL NOT EXCEEDING MEDIUM SPEED, AND BE PREPARED TO ENTER DIVERGING ROUTE AT PRESCRIBED SPEED
aspect: semaphore head-id:1 angle:45; light head-id:1 color:yellow; light head-id:2 color:yellow
semaphore head-id:1 angle:45; light head-id:1 color:yellow flashing
light head-id:1 color:yellow; light head-id:2 color:yellow

rules.name: DIVERGING-CLEAR
rules.indication: PROCEED THROUGH DIVERGING ROUTE; PRESCRIBED SPEED THROUGH TURNOUT
aspect: light head-id:1 color:red; light head-id:2 color:green

rules.name: APPROACH
rules.indication: PROCEED PREPARING TO STOP AT NEXT SIGNAL; IF EXCEEDING MEDIUM SPEED IMMEDIATELY REDUCE TO MEDIUM SPEED
aspect: semaphore head-id:1 angle:45; light head-id:1 color:yellow

rules.name: DIVERGING-APPROACH
rules.indication: PROCEED THROUGH DIVERGING ROUTE; PRESCRIBED SPEED THROUGH TURNOUT; APPROACH NEXT SIGNAL PREPARING TO STOP, IF EXCEEDING MEDIUM SPEED IMMEDIATELY REDUCE TO MEDIUM SPEED
aspect: light head-id:1 color:red; light head-id:2 color:yellow flashing

rules.name: RESTRICTING
aspect: semaphore head-id:1 angle:90; light head-id:1 color:red flashing
light head-id:1 color:red; light head-id:2 color:yellow

rules.name: STOP AND PROCEED
rules.indication: STOP; THEN PROCEED AS PRESCRIBED BY RULE 320
aspect: number-plate present:yes; semaphore head-id:1 angle:90; light head-id:1 color:red

rules.name: STOP
aspect: semaphore head-id:1 angle:90; light head-id:1 color:red; number-plate present:no
